content: I nominated https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/89926 for discussion. I personally think, given all the issues people experience with panics due to non-monotonic systems, we should make this change.
This would remove some complexity from the standard library, and remove a real source of panics for users.
People do experience these panics, on real systems, and (if we're lucky) come to rust-lang/rust to try to figure out how to deal with them.
